com.dor.coupons.system.dbdao

Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dor.coupons.system.dbdao.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO

    This CustomerDBDAO class implements CustomerDAO interface,

    and override all the methods for reading and writing to the Customer table in the database.

    All the methods that want to communicate with the database, get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws CustomerExistsException

        Add a customer to the database.

        Use the customerRepo class to save the given customer object to the database.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Specified by:
        createCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer object you want to add to the database.
        Throws:
        CustomerExistsException

      • getPurchasedCoupoonByTitle

        public Coupon getPurchasedCoupoonByTitle(java.lang.String title)

        Use customerRepo to get a purchased Coupon by a given title.

        The coupon belongs to the last customer that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        title - Title of the purchesed coupon you want to get.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given title that has been purchased by the last successfully logged in customer.

      • getCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()

        Get all coupons the client purchased.

        Getting the last customer who successfully logged in, and returning all its coupons.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Specified by:
        getCoupons in interface CustomerDAO
        Returns:
        Collection of all the coupons that the customer purchase.

      • getCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType couponType)

        Use the customerRepo class to get all coupons by given coupon type.

        The coupons belong to the last customer that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        couponType - Enum of Coupon type of the requested coupons.
        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects with the requested coupon type.

      • getCouponsByTopPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByTopPrice(double price)

        Use the customerRepo class to get all coupons whose price is lower or equel to a given price.

        The coupons belong to the last customer that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        price - The maximum price (of the coupon) you want to get.
        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects whose price is lower or equal to the given price.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String customerName,
                     java.lang.String password)

        Checks if customer exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database

        Use the customerRepo class to check if there is a customer with the same given name and password in the database.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Specified by:
        login in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customerName - Given customer name String for login
        password - Given customer password String for login
        Returns:
        Boolean of login success
